channel.title: Windows on Eric's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Eric's Blog

item.title: Windows & Mac: United at Long Last
item.description: Playing GTAV on Windows, while running MacOS. All in one computer. …Why? I have an iPhone, Apple Watch, Airpods, and Macbook Pro but sadly no Desktop Mac… until now. Solutions to docking my Macbook into my monitor using a dongle or eGPU seemed gross. Plus, I saw Linus do it and thought it’d be cool ðŸ˜Ž Credits to Linus Tech Tips I also sometimes need to use a Mac.
